abstract: Like most oil companies, Exxon benefited from a near doubling of oil prices, as well as higher demand for gasoline last year.
snippet: Like most oil companies, Exxon benefited from a near doubling of oil prices, as well as higher demand for gasoline last year.
lead_paragraph: By any measure, Exxon Mobil’s performance last year was a blowout.

headline.main: Exxon Sets Profit Record: $40.6 Billion Last Year
headline.print_headline: Exxon Sets Profit Record: $40.6 Billion Last Year
